metadata.title: CVE-2024-30166 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In Mbed TLS 3.3.0 through 3.5.2 before 3.6.0, a malicious client can causeinformation disclosure or a denial of service because of a stack bufferover-read (of less than 256 bytes) in a TLS 1.3 server via a TLS 3.1ClientHello.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
